bibl.title: Some Orthographical Problems in the Papyri of Later Greek Comedy II: -ei or -h(i) as the Ending of the Second Person Singular Middle and Passive in the Present ant Other Tenses of Verbs in -v. <-ei, -e(i), -o>
bibl.note: Suite de: ZPE 134 (2001) pp. 43-51, 1 tabl. - (A) Papyri of Menander and other New Comedy poets. - (B) Book fragments of Menander and other New Comedy poets.
bibl.seg: ARNOTT W. Geoffrey, Some Orthographical Problems in the Papyri of Later Greek Comedy II: -ei or -h(i) as the Ending of the Second Person Singular Middle and Passive in the Present ant Other Tenses of Verbs in -v. <-ei, -e(i), -o>
